animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and gray.
💦 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Woof! Woof!' and love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🏡 I guard your house.
🐾 I wag my tail when I'm happy.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🦒 I am the tallest animal on land.
🤎 My spots help me blend in.

animal.question: I quack and waddle, and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat small plants and insects.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🦆 I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I roar loudly and have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am known as the king of the jungle.
🍖 I like to eat meat.
🦁 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to munch on vegetables.
🐇 I have long ears.
🌿 I can be white, brown, or black.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🙊 I make a lot of noise.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🐒 I have a long tail.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌱 I eat grass.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I am a big reptile with sharp teeth and live in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I have a very strong bite.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
💚 I am usually green.

transport.question: I go on the road and have four wheels. People ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have a steering wheel.
👪 You can ride in me with your family.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓️ I might have a horn that goes 'Toot Toot!'
🛥️ I can be big or small.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ⚙️ You need to balance.
🤸 You wear a helmet when you ride me.
🔔 I have a bell that goes 'ring ring!'

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take lots of people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings.
💺 You sit down when you ride in me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many passengers or things. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📣 I often have a loud whistle.
📦 I can carry things like mail or even cars!

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school each day. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
🎒 I'm full of kids in the morning.
🚦 I have flashing lights.

transport.question: I can fly straight up, and my blades go 'whump, whump, whump!' What am I?

hints.text: ⚕️ I can sometimes help people who are hurt.
🚁 I don't need a runway to take off.
🚨 I can be used by the police.

transport.question: I go very fast in space and can take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I have a countdown before I fly.
👨‍🚀 People wear special suits when they ride in me.
⭐ I travel past the stars.

transport.question: I help people get around in a city and you pay the driver. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I usually have a meter inside.
🚖 Sometimes I am yellow.
📍 You can call me to pick you up.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that can travel on land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🛟 I might be used to rescue people.
🛥️ Some are used by the military.
🚧 I can be both a boat and a car.
